author: Beth K
comment: Everyone needs to drink more water this is a quick reminder to help you reach your goal. Easy to record your water with just a tap. I like the 5 minute snooze if I'm not able to drink water I can snooze it and attempt to get it done within 5 minutes and no fear of forgetting. Very easy to adjust to fit you. Using on a Moto 360 v2.
title: Great app that is easy to use

author: Susan Bonner
comment: Helpful, but I would like it to remember that I want to drink a specified number of glasses every day - I drink 11 8 oz and I have to set it every day. If I am target I still get the alarms which is annoying. I would like to set when I should drink and if I input that I drank water then I should not get the alarm. Keep updating please it is a beautiful and clean design.

author: Mark Frasier
comment: Simple and easy to use.
title: Cool app

author: ahmed aposhady
comment: I bought the app but i didn't get it on samsung gear s3 neither my telephone , where it is

author: Salatiel
comment: Add an option to disable it on weekends.
Does Exactly what it says...I LOVE this app!

author: Erin Schmid
comment: The idea behind this app is good but the functionality isn't great. You can't subtract water if you accidentally add too much, you can't add water from your phone and you can't add water to the previous day (which occasionally messes up my records). This app could use a lot of updates so in the meantime I will be looking for a different app to use. Also, the alarm rarely works.
title: Looking for a different app

author: Ara Wagoner
comment: Also, if you switch watches/phones frequently, remember that you'll have to turn the alarm back on and set it up every time (shame it can't save and sync your data). Also, on the record watch notifications, have record be the swipe before snooze.
title: Be careful of the alarm accidentally turning itself off

author: Maween Nose
comment: After 3 days of trying to set the alarm on, i found what the problem was. You must setup the alarm to ON during the day. I was trying at night to set the alarm for next day between 8am and 7pm and i couldn't. You are able to set the alarm on only during the specified time frame otherwise it won't turn on. Please fix it. I gave 3 stars as I have just turned it on and not received an alarm yet. I will soon change it up or down. EDIT i change rating to 1 star. App drains battery too fast plus it does not notify everytime it was supposed to. I uninstall it. Better use recursive alarm.
title: Total crap

author: Dwight SwoopFiasco Jones
comment: The one thing that bugs me about this app is that if you set it for more than 8, it gives you a warning about too much water.  Fair.  But at least specify whether it's 8cups, 8 8oz glasses, 8 liters, 8 gallons.  Just saying s inking more than 8 can be dangerous is silly if you have not specified exactly what 8 is.  I set mine for twelve (8oz glasses) and I get a warning, which again, is silly because I'm 6'1 and 232lbs.  Lose the warning or be specific. Also, it should keep the previous setting of 12.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Dwight, the app assumes 1 glass = 8 oz of water. We want to keep it simple. Keeping the previous setting is a good idea and will put that in future release. Thanks!

title: Good

author: Trevor Simpson
comment: Timer will not start nor can I drink less than 14 glasses per day. Basically this app does nothing but take up space
title: Horrible.......uninstalling

author: Paulo Gatchalian
comment: If you have to remember to set something up daily to remind you of another thing, it is useless.

author: Michael Toub
comment: Demands me to buy, didn't do anything yet
title: Demands me to buy, didn't do anything yet

author: Elrond Bishop
comment: An app that actually does what you would expect!
title: At last

author: André Couceiro
comment: Can get better...
title: Nice

author: Oswaldo Marroquin
comment: Nice app
title: Excelent

author: unicorn universe
comment: Nice

author: Geronimo Matias
comment: 1) Every morning, it is still showing the previous day's amount of glasses drank. I have to swipe to the next screen and back again to reset. 2) If I increase the count, shouldn't the timer reset? 3) When I have reached my goal, tapping it again still says the top number but in the logs, you'll see the extra taps. 4) I always have mine set to 8 glasses, but my logs shows 8/0,  7/0, 1/0. I even have my previous weeks with an empty date with 0/0.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hello Geronimo, We are currently looking at these issues. We will release updates as soon as these are fixed. Thanks for you feedback!

title: Needs more work

author: Tony Hall
comment: The app crashes everytime I try to open it on my Galaxy Note 4. I also cannot lower the amount of glasses I want to drink per say on the watch. Seems confusing without working companion app. Hope to see if fixed soon!

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Tony, We are currently trying to figure out what's causing this crashing issue on some phones. We will release a new update as soon as this is fixed. Thanks for letting us know.

title: Needs work

author: Wm. Hunter Tammaro
comment: Great idea, good design, but works inconsistently. Sometimes stops playing alarms for hours until you manually open the app. Drops recorded drinks on occasion. I wish there was a way to add and view history from my phone too.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hello Hunter, We are currently looking at these issues. We will release updates as soon as these are fixed. Thanks for you feedback!

title: Inconsistent

author: Brian Treusch
comment: App crashes after double beep. Good looking watch interface though. Hope to see improvement.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Brian, we just released a new version. Please update and let us know if it fixed the problem. Thanks for your feedback.

title: "Unlock 30 days" doesn't open on phone

author: Joe Katon
comment: I needed this kick in the rear to get better about this. Good job. Everything pushed over fine. Was able to set all features without an issue. Tracker purchase pushed fine too. Thank you.
title: Great app LG G Watch

author: Richard Rembala
comment: Very nice and simple interface, however notification function is very inconsistent. Each day it mysteriously stops at some point and I need to manually open the app and update.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hello Richard, We are currently looking at these issues. We will release updates as soon as these are fixed. Thanks for you feedback!

author: Jason George
comment: The app hasn't worked once since I installed it a few weeks ago. I thought possibly and installation error so I uninstalled and reinstalled thinking that may fix it. Wrong, still not working. I'm running stock Android on a Verizon Note 3.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Jason, we just released a new version. Please update and let us know if it fixed the problem. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Instant Crash

author: Kem Sorrell
comment: Works well on watch. Activating paid 30 day feature ($.99) did require a restart to activate on watch. Would give 5 Stars for a little more optimization ability (baby blue background is a bit washed out because of Sony's use of a TFT display instead of OLED).
title: Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Pradaman Shorey
comment: Crashes all the time on galaxy s6 edge. Please fix it ASAP.  Really strange that there is no UI for the phone and no data backup

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Pradaman, we just released a new version. Please update and let us know if it fixed the problem. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Unable to open

author: Jesse Hickman
comment: Crashes on Galaxy Note 4

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Jesse, We are currently trying to figure out what's causing this crashing issue on some phones. We will release a new update as soon as this is fixed. Thanks for letting us know.

title: Unusable

author: Karen Greenwood
comment: Update: love the new alarm options.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Karen, we listened to everyone's feedback and recently updated the app. You can now customize your active hours so that the app doesn't disturb you when you're asleep.

title: Good app, great response from developer

author: David Alexis
comment: Works great on Android Wear.
title: Great!

author: Mohideen Hussain
comment: Good apps
title: Mohideen

author: Mitchell Fruecht
comment: Does what I need it to. Reminds me to drink water. A little lacking in features. I would prefer to be able to set glass size and also since I work at 7AM I wish the alarms could be activated earlier.
title: Great little app

author: Gaurang Telang
comment: Crashing fixed on 2/4. Doesn't show up on the watch.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Gaurang, thanks for following up on the crash issue. We will look into the watch install issue. Feel free to contact us at info(AT)aeustech.com

title: Nexus 6 - Crashes on start

author: Evin Anthony
comment: Works pretty well on Nexus 6. Would like to see a function where you can preset the amount of fl oz for daily intake based on glass size. Maybe in the future some Google fit integration / tracking.
title: So far Pretty good

author: Dave Doe
comment: After the update the app no longer crashes. Very useful tracker for those wanting to stay hydrated but have busy schedules.
title: Works great

author: Victor Gracia
comment: Nexus 6, giving it another shot, 3 stars for now, will update later

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Victor, thanks for confirming about the crash fix. Feel free to contact us at info(AT)aeustech.com

title: Not crashing anymore

author: Aeus Tech
comment: Simple and helpful!

author: Chris Panagoulias
comment: Crashed as soon as I installed it and tried to launch it on my phone. It appears to function on my watch, but I'm unable to subtract glasses of water using the associated button. Configuring the alarm seems to work, although I haven't tested whether or not it actually activates properly.  Seems like it could be a good app, but the bugs really need to be worked on.

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Chris, we recently updated the app. Let us know if the latest version fixes the crashing issue. You can subtract (remove) entries by going to the "Track" menu on your watch and pressing on the desired date. Feel free to contact us at info(AT)aeustech.com

title: Unfinished

author: Bob Romero
comment: crashes every time.. Major fail  (lollipop M8 GPE)

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Bob, we recently updated the app. Let us know if the latest version fixes the crashing issue with Lollipop. Feel free to contact us at info(AT)aeustech.com

title: will not launch

author: Marco Mendoza
comment: Works great so far. For those that say it doesn't work try checking your watch not your phone
title: Great
